s3.sync_deploy_trigger: String to trigger a sync to s3

hard_deploy.trigger: String to trigger an overwrite of S3 files

email.service: Which service to use, e.g. gmail. Full list: https://github.com/andris9/nodemailer-wellknown#supported-services
email.address: The email account that will send you stdout
email.name: The name on this account, e.g. Kestrel Songs.
email.clientId: Your Google app clientId. See this for credential generation http://gmtplus12.com/2014/08/15/setting-up-nodemailer-for-gmail/
